root.name: Microsoft Space Simulator
root.description: Microsoft Space Simulator allowed players to simulate various real and fictional space craft. Similar to its popular Flight Simulator series, the game was divided into a free-play mode and a variety of scenarios - such as launching the space shuttle or landing the Apollo program's Lunar Excursion Module. The game included locations such as the International Space Station, Kennedy Space Center, and a fictional Mars base. The game also included an observatory mode which allowed for virtual stargazing.
